body:
Hello guys,

I was toying with the Whatsapi.php script and ran into these two errors:
PHP Fatal error:  Call to undefined function getDictionary() in /var/www/whatsprot.class.php on line 36

I fixed the above error by simply adding a require statement in whatsprot.class.php:
require "decode.php";

The getDictionary() function is in decode.php. This resolved the first error, but then i got a second error:
PHP Fatal error:  Class 'BinTreeNodeWriter' not found in /var/www/whatsprot.class.php on line 38

The "BinTreeNodeWriter" class is in "protocol.class.php" and this is already required in whatsprot.class.php. 

So, I am not sure why it is not working.

I am using:
Server version: Apache/2.2.22
PHP 5.3.10-1

Any ideas why this is happening?
title: PHP Fatal Error: undefined getDictionary() and class BinTreeNodeWriter not found
